headline: Applied Digital (APLD) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of digital infrastructure provider Applied Digital (NASDAQ:APLD) jumped 15.6% in the afternoon session after the company announced plans for a new $3 billion AI data center campus and received a significant price target increase from analysts.

headline: 2 Safe-and-Steady Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 We Brush Off
summary: A stock with low volatility can be reassuring, but it doesn’t always mean strong long-term performance. Investors who prioritize stability may miss out on higher-reward opportunities elsewhere.
